name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proactive Senior Support Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong skills in scripting, Python, and cross-platform environments (Windows, Linux, UNIX) to deliver seamless support and solutions. I have a solid understanding of Networking and Fibre Channel protocols, supported by hands-on experience with SAN and SNMP, enabling efficient troubleshooting and problem resolution. My technical expertise extends to integrating and utilizing Rest APIs, ensuring smooth connectivity and communication between various systems.
Additionally, I excel in collaboration and teamwork, effectively communicating complex technical issues and solutions to diverse stakeholders. With a background in full-stack development, I have successfully built high-performance applications, utilizing technologies like **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, while focusing on enhancing user experience and operational efficiency. I bring a strong problem-solving mindset, contributing to innovative solutions in challenging scenarios.
